title: How to automatically extract data from a website - Quora

response.answer_text: You will need a tool that is called a web scraper. What a web scraper does is it accesses the website you need collect specific data points form it and stores it somewhere you set it to. Web scrapers usually have some features that help them “fool” the website that it is a genuine person accessing the website and not a bot, thus making it less likely for the scraper to get blocked. Some of the web scrapers I would recommend checking out: oxylabs.ioscrapinghub.comwebscraper.iooctoparse.com
You can use BeautifulSoup and Selenium to extract data from a website. BeautifulSoup and Selenium are Python packages. Learn how to use them. Start with BeautifulSoup. It is so simple!
